page.title: 18Littlecote House
page.content: snatched the baby from her arms and sent her back to look after the mother While the mid wife had gone and was not looking William Darrell threw the baby onto the fire. Just as the midwife returned to the room William Darrell took the midwife by her hand and said to her that if she did not tell anyone about it he would give her a big bag of money. She agreed to this. She was blindfolded again and sent back to her village. The midwife was no fool for when she was on her death bed she told someone this story. She also told this person how many stairs she was lead up and showed them a piece of cloth she had cut out of the curtain round the bed.They decided that the crime had been done at Litlecote.William Darnell was taken to court but he knew the judge well and the judge stuck up for William
